SEARCH
Package controller

Class SupervisorController

java.lang.Object
utils.Base
controller.BaseController
controller.UserController
controller.SupervisorController
Direct Known Subclasses:
CoordinatorController
public class SupervisorController extends UserController
The SupervisorController class is a subclass of UserController that handles supervisor-specific functionalities. It manages the creation and retrieval of projects, setting supervisor passwords, and managing incoming and outgoing requests.
Since:
2023-04-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
Khoo Yong Hui

    • supervisorInList

      public boolean supervisorInList(String supervisorID, ArrayList<Supervisor> supervisors)
      Verifies that the supervisor is indeed in the list of supervisors.
      Parameters:
      supervisorID - ID of the supervisor to check
      supervisors - ArrayList of all supervisors
      Returns:
      true if supervisor is found and false when no such supervisor exists.

    • reachedProjectCap

      public boolean reachedProjectCap(String supervisorID)
      Checks if the supervisor is already supervising two projects.
      Parameters:
      supervisorID - ID of the supervisor to check
      Returns:
      true if supervisor is supervising two projects (reached the maximum number of projects he/she is allowed to supervise) and false if the cap has not been reached.
